promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a dynamic strong cat psychic-type pokemon wearing regal bracers. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or cat. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptofelis, a a dynamic strong cat psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Burning Ball, Fireworks Bomb. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "cat", "psychic" or "Cryptofelis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, cat-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, pink bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Living in shadowed vaults, Cryptofelis wields flaming orbs and starry explosions with its mind. Its enigmatic lifestyle sparks intrigue.
